items.title: bclarke123/tinygpu: Lightweight WebGPU wrapper library

items.content_html: M3U Playlist Proxy is a lightweight server that lets you stream, customize, and manage IPTV M3U playlists with ease. Whether you're cleaning up bloated channel lists, adding authentication to protect your stream, or just want a better way to serve your playlists — this tool gives you full control. With built-in support for filtering, and more
items.title: DisabledAbel/M3U-playlist-porxy: M3U Playlist Proxy is a lightweight server that lets you stream, customize, and manage IPTV M3U playlists with ease. Whether you're cleaning up bloated channel lists, adding authentication to protect your stream, or just want a better way to serve your playlists — this tool gives you full control. With built-in support for filtering, and more

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
items.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Job Tracker API is a lightweight RESTful service built on Cloudflare Workers that helps manage job applications with full CRUD operations. It leverages OpenAPI 3.1 with chanfana and Hono for automatic documentation generation and request validation. The API uses SQLite/D1 for data persistence and provides clean error handling
items.title: Macktireh/job-tracker-api: Job Tracker API is a lightweight RESTful service built on Cloudflare Workers that helps manage job applications with full CRUD operations. It leverages OpenAPI 3.1 with chanfana and Hono for automatic documentation generation and request validation. The API uses SQLite/D1 for data persistence and provides clean error handling
